scripts.install:ios:clean: cd ios && rm -rf Pods/ Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.install:all:update: yarn install && cd ios && pod install --repo-update && cd ..
scripts.ios:archive:debug: sh ./clean_ios.sh && xcodebuild -workspace ./ios/Paave.xcworkspace -scheme Paave -configuration Debug clean archive -archivePath ./output/ios/Paave.xcarchive -destination 'generic/platform=iOS'
scripts.ios:archive:release: sh ./clean_ios.sh && xcodebuild -workspace ./ios/Paave.xcworkspace -scheme Paave -configuration Release clean archive -archivePath ./output/ios/Paave.xcarchive -destination 'generic/platform=iOS'
scripts.android:bundle: mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --minify --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android:device:debug: yarn android:clean && cd ./android && ./gradlew clean installDebug && cd ..
scripts.android:device:release: yarn android:clean && cd ./android && ./gradlew clean installRelease && cd ..
scripts.android:build:debug: yarn compile && yarn android:bundle && yarn android:clean && cd android && ./gradlew clean app:assembleDebug && cd .. && mkdir -p output/android && cp -f android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/*.apk ./output/android/
scripts.android:build:release: yarn compile && yarn android:bundle && yarn android:clean &&  cd android && ./gradlew clean app:assembleRelease && cd .. && mkdir -p output/android && cp -f android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/*.apk ./output/android/
scripts.android:build:bundle: sh ./fetch_version.sh prod && yarn compile && yarn android:bundle && yarn android:clean &&  cd android && ./gradlew clean bundleRelease && cd .. && mkdir -p output/android && cp -f android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/*.aab ./output/android/
scripts.build:all:uat: yarn config:uat &&  yarn install:all:clean && yarn ios:build:release && yarn android:build:release && yarn testfairy_auto:all && yarn lambdatest:all:uat
scripts.build:all:prod: yarn config:prod && yarn install:all:clean && yarn ios:build:release && yarn android:build:release && yarn testfairy_auto:all && yarn lambdatest:all:prod
scripts.codepush:ios:uat: codepush() { yarn config:uat; appcenter codepush release-react -a difisoft/Paave-IOS -d Staging -t "$@" --mandatory true;}; codepush
scripts.codepush:android:uat: codepush() { yarn config:uat; appcenter codepush release-react -a difisoft/Paave-Android -d Staging -t "$@"  --mandatory true;}; codepush
scripts.codepush:ios:prod: codepush() { yarn config:prod; appcenter codepush release-react -a difisoft/Paave-IOS -d Production -t "$@"  --mandatory true;}; codepush
scripts.codepush:android:prod: codepush() { yarn config:prod; appcenter codepush release-react -a difisoft/Paave-Android -d Production -t "$@" --mandatory true;}; codepush
scripts.codepush:clear:ios:uat: echo 'y' | appcenter codepush deployment clear -a difisoft/Paave-IOS Staging
scripts.codepush:clear:android:uat: echo 'y' | appcenter codepush deployment clear -a difisoft/Paave-Android Staging
scripts.codepush:clear:ios:prod: echo 'y' | appcenter codepush deployment clear -a difisoft/Paave-IOS Production
scripts.codepush:clear:android:prod: echo 'y' | appcenter codepush deployment clear -a difisoft/Paave-Android Production
scripts.testfairy_auto: testfairy() { curl https://upload.testfairy.com/api/upload -F api_key='5cc8d459aa7294dcd46d97f50fb960805df32253' -F file=@"$@" -F auto-update='on';}; testfairy
scripts.testfairy:ios: APPNAME=`ls -t ./output/ios | grep ipa | head -1` && yarn testfairy ./output/ios/$APPNAME
scripts.testfairy:android: APPNAME=`ls -t ./output/android | grep apk | head -1` && yarn testfairy ./output/android/$APPNAME
scripts.testfairy_auto:ios: APPNAME=`ls -t ./output/ios | grep ipa | head -1` && yarn testfairy_auto ./output/ios/$APPNAME
scripts.testfairy_auto:android: APPNAME=`ls -t output/android | grep apk | head -1` && yarn testfairy_auto ./output/android/$APPNAME
scripts.lambdatest:android:uat: APPNAME=`ls -t ./output/android | grep apk | head -1` && VERSION=`head -1 ./paave_version.txt` && BUILDNO=`touch ./paave_buildno.txt && head -1 ./paave_buildno.txt | awk '{printf("%02d", $1)}'` && BUILDDATE=`date '+%y%m%d'` && curl -u "whkim:hCNy7G0EFdydAKGQuPP3p8PKJdf43E9AYA3JoMLK3kgTjA0rpT" -X POST "https://manual-api.lambdatest.com/app/upload/realDevice" -F "appFile=@"./output/android/$APPNAME"" -F "name=Paave_UAT.$VERSION-$BUILDDATE$BUILDNO.apk" -F "custom_id=Paave" -F "storage=file" -F "visibility=team"
scripts.lambdatest:android:prod: APPNAME=`ls -t ./output/android | grep apk | head -1` && VERSION=`head -1 ./paave_version.txt` && BUILDNO=`touch ./paave_buildno.txt && head -1 ./paave_buildno.txt | awk '{printf("%02d", $1)}'` && BUILDDATE=`date '+%y%m%d'` && curl -u "whkim:hCNy7G0EFdydAKGQuPP3p8PKJdf43E9AYA3JoMLK3kgTjA0rpT" -X POST "https://manual-api.lambdatest.com/app/upload/realDevice" -F "appFile=@"./output/android/$APPNAME"" -F "name=Paave.$VERSION-$BUILDDATE$BUILDNO.apk" -F "custom_id=Paave" -F "storage=file" -F "visibility=team"
scripts.lambdatest:ios:uat: APPNAME=`ls -t ./output/ios | grep ipa | head -1` && VERSION=`head -1 ./paave_version.txt` && BUILDNO=`touch ./paave_buildno.txt && head -1 ./paave_buildno.txt | awk '{printf("%02d", $1)}'` && BUILDDATE=`date '+%y%m%d'` && curl -u "whkim:hCNy7G0EFdydAKGQuPP3p8PKJdf43E9AYA3JoMLK3kgTjA0rpT" -X POST "https://manual-api.lambdatest.com/app/upload/realDevice" -F "appFile=@"./output/ios/$APPNAME"" -F "name=Paave_UAT.$VERSION-$BUILDDATE$BUILDNO.ipa" -F "custom_id=Paave" -F "storage=file" -F "visibility=team"
scripts.lambdatest:ios:prod: APPNAME=`ls -t ./output/ios | grep ipa | head -1` && VERSION=`head -1 ./paave_version.txt` && BUILDNO=`touch ./paave_buildno.txt && head -1 ./paave_buildno.txt | awk '{printf("%02d", $1)}'` && BUILDDATE=`date '+%y%m%d'` && curl -u "whkim:hCNy7G0EFdydAKGQuPP3p8PKJdf43E9AYA3JoMLK3kgTjA0rpT" -X POST "https://manual-api.lambdatest.com/app/upload/realDevice" -F "appFile=@"./output/ios/$APPNAME"" -F "name=Paave.$VERSION-$BUILDDATE$BUILDNO.ipa" -F "custom_id=Paave" -F "storage=file" -F "visibility=team"
